vulnerable.commit_message:
Bluetooth: virtio_bt: fix memory leak in virtbt_rx_handle()

On the reception of packets with an invalid packet type, the memory of
the allocated socket buffers is never freed. Add a default case that frees
these to avoid a memory leak.

Fixes: afd2daa26c7a ("Bluetooth: Add support for virtio transport driver")
Signed-off-by: Soenke Huster <soenke.huster@eknoes.de>
Signed-off-by: Marcel Holtmann <marcel@holtmann.org>
vulnerable.cve_desc: drivers/bluetooth/virtio_bt.c in the Linux kernel before 5.16.3 has a memory leak (socket buffers have memory allocated but not freed).
